website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Cyber-shot DCS-QX100 is an example of a bold design as a smartphone add-on lens, but there are performance issues that keep us from recommending it.
cons: Shutter lag when triggering from phone
Takes time to mount to phone
Slow startup compared to a standalone camera

customer_reviews.title: "Pocket size" high quality SLR camera
customer_reviews.text: Unusual: a high quality but pocket size SLR lens without the camera body. It can be used aiming blindly (if in a hurry) as the viewer/remote control are replaced by a simple app on the mobile phone. Excellent quality of course, but a quirky, specialised gadget I am very happy with on dog walks and with horse training. Like it very much as my big SLR is unwieldy.
customer_reviews.author: Sunisa

customer_reviews.title: Zeiss lens camera.
customer_reviews.text: This lens camera has stopped me buying smart phones for photo capabilities. In fact does not work with nokia 1020 windows os phone.Conversly works perfectly with htc one or sony ultra. The photos taken are unbeatable. By seperating phone from the lens endless interesting viewing positions can be found. I have bees nesting below gutter in a hole eighteen feet up. I just have to mount the lens camera on pole and snap away. Just one chritisism is lens has to be manually turned on by pressing button before conecting to phone for viewing. So annoying . I recomend this qx 100 and if rich would buy two. david evans teush
customer_reviews.author: David Evans-teush

customer_reviews.title: Like it, but
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's a very good camera. But the app is atrocious. Although Camera 360 have brought out a feature within their app that will work with the Sony, this is NOT a point and shoot. Can be used to photograph in unusual spaces - leave it in a garden pot etc. but don't think this will work quickly. It is fiddly and you'll miss any action scene by the time you've got it working. It uses its own wifi which takes a while to load.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Citizen

customer_reviews.title: a great compact lens
customer_reviews.text: A great compact camera lens that has added a more "professional style" to my family snaps. Great product and delivered on time. Excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: Col White

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price - used for high level remote shutter photography. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Pete 67

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, let down by app implementation
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to getting this and the I have to say that when it takes photos the quality is excellent. However, the operative word is 'when'. I experience far too many lock ups and lagging to make it really useable. I have waited for app updates but it hasn't made things better. I'm using an iPhone 5S with IOS7. There's plenty of hardware resource there to cope but it's just unusable as a camera replacement. I'm now processing a refund.
customer_reviews.author: A. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful idea. Awful in reality
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work out for me as the concept is great. Unfortunately, the 'link' between it and my Samsung Galaxy S3 smartphone was so bad that it wasn't usable. Frames were dropped and the software constantly crashed. I couldn't get NFC to work, so used the wifi instead. Lasted about an hour before packaging it up and returning it. Bought a 'normal' camcorder instead.
customer_reviews.author: R. Birket

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool product
customer_reviews.text: I saw this and could not wait to get my hands on it. I could not be happier with it. This product has had some bad reviews online because there is no manual setting options. Thing is, I know NOTHING about photography, but can still take amazing photos! My one issue with this is the camera app you are forced to use - no flexibility for creativeness and experimentation. However, Camera360 will imminently be launching support for this. Problem solved! I forsee many years of satisfaction with this handy springboard into photography.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: You need a very high spec Android or an iPhone to use this
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this unless you have an iPhone or a an Android with lots of RAM and high processing power. I have a Sony Xperia and the performance is totally unacceptable. Even on the latest iPhone the performance is very very bad. Personally I'd buy a camera.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shams

customer_reviews.title: Quality photos but ultimately awkward
customer_reviews.text: Connection is simple, only works with the one app of course, so you'll need to import later for things like vine or instagram. Images are comparable to a good point and shoot camera, but the controls and ergonomics aren't. It's too unwieldy to leave on the phone all day, but then it's not on the phone when you could use the zoom, and then the moment's gone. Compared to this, cheaper add-ons like the olloclip offer similar creative options, that you're simply more likely to take with you and use. Unless you're specifically looking for higher quality images, I would take a look at that.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Duffy

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: As described and more. Delivery was prompt. This camera is brilliant quality and takes high quality photos...possibilities are endless. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have read a lot of negative reviews about this item but have so far found it to be excellent. I use it with a iphone 5s, mainly for the zoom capability and i am very impressed with the images. The software seems to work OK, as does the Wifi. The only downside so far is charging it, it's hard work because the usb cable is so short
customer_reviews.author: Christtt

customer_reviews.title: Great innovation
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It connects seamlessly with my iPad and iPhone, both of which are running iOS 7, and produces some really beautiful shots. It's like having my SLR with me wherever I go! Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Pearce

product_meta.title: DSC-QX100 - Digital camera - attachable

Zoom optique: 3,6x, Longueur focale: 10,4 - 37,1 mm, Minimum distance focale (35mm equiv): 2,8 cm. Modes Auto Focusing (AF): auto focus individuel. Sensibilité ISO: 160, 200, 250, 320, 400, 500, 640, 800, 1000, 1250, 1600, 2000, 2250, 2500, 3200, 4000, 5000, 6400. Vous recherchez un appareil photo offrant de vraies performances professionnelles ? Utilisez votre téléphone ! Tout ce que vous avez à faire, c'est de placer l'objectif intelligent contre n'importe quel smartphone NFC pour établir une connexion. Vous disposez dorénavant du contrôle et des ressources dont vous avez besoin pour réaliser des clichés exceptionnels. Restez connecté avec n'importe quel smartphone Transformez n'importe quel smartphone en appareil photo hautes performances. C'est très simple. Couplez l'objectif intelligent à votre smartphone et commencez à prendre vos photos. Votre smartphone devient le boîtier de l'appareil photo : utilisez l'écran tactile pour prendre, retoucher et partager des photos sur Facebook® et Twitter™. Ne vous laissez pas séparer par la distance Amusez-vous avec un objectif intelligent. Il vous suffit d'établir un contact avec votre smartphone compatible NFC pour bénéficier d'une grande liberté sans fil et pour trouver des angles de vue encore inédits. Vous n'avez pas de smartphone compatible NFC ? Connectez-vous en Wi-Fi®. Pour figurer sur une photo de groupe : posez l'objectif à terre et prenez la photo avec votre smartphone.
